summary.span: 提供保护内存和取消内存保护的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供访问到数据保护 API (DPAPI) 在 Windows XP 和更高版本操作系统中可用。This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. 这是一种服务，由操作系统提供，不需要其他库。This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. 它提供了在内存中的敏感数据加密。It provides encryption for sensitive data in memory. 类包含两个包装的非托管 DPAPI和。The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . 这两种方法可以用于加密和解密内存中的数据。These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用数据保护。The following example shows how to use data protection.
